docs.snippet: HOUSTON, Tex., Nov 7 -The Delta Line plans to inaugurate luxury passenger service out of the Port of Houston to the East Coast of South America in January.

docs.snippet: The New York City Ballet, which will open a nine-week season at the City Center on Dec. 8, will present as its major novelty a full evening program called "Pan America." This will consist of short ballets by seven choreographers to the music of nine...
docs.lead_paragraph: The New York City Ballet, which will open a nine-week season at the City Center on Dec. 8, will present as its major novelty a full evening program called "Pan America." This will consist of short ballets by seven choreographers to the music of nine Latin-American composers.

headline.main: PAN AMERICA' BALLETS; City Troupe Plans Novelty -- Season Opens Dec. 8

docs.snippet: THE New York City Ballet comes to the City Center for the twenty-fifth time on Dec. 8, to remain for a season of nine weeks. Naturally it will bring with it a novelty or two.
docs.lead_paragraph: THE New York City Ballet comes to the City Center for the twenty-fifth time on Dec. 8, to remain for a season of nine weeks. Naturally it will bring with it a novelty or two.
docs.abstract: NYC Ballet, at Balanchine suggestion, to offer Pan Amer program of 9 short works

headline.main: DANCE: NEW SEASON AHEAD; New York City Ballet Plans a Pan-American Novelty For Its Nine-Week Repertory at City Center

docs.snippet: UNITED NATIONS, N. Y., Dec. 12 -- The General Assembly adopted unanimously tonight a resolution under which the United Nations will make a fresh start in its efforts to encourage and regulate the peaceful uses of outer space.

docs.snippet: UNITED NATIONS, N. Y., Sunday, Dec. 13 -- The General Assembly endorsed an East-West compromise this morning by electing Poland to a two-year term on the Security Council.
docs.lead_paragraph: UNITED NATIONS, N. Y., Sunday, Dec. 13 -- The General Assembly endorsed an East-West compromise this morning by electing Poland to a two-year term on the Security Council.
